definition: to collect local cultural material (recording folk songs, taking photos etc)
to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather

sentences.english: First day of music tour, countryside of Guizhou Province.
sentences.chinese: 採風第一天，貴州五一寨農田。

sentences.english: There is a long tradition of folk art collection in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國有着悠久的民間藝術採風傳統。

sentences.english: They drove the car and went out for a spin.
sentences.chinese: 他們開車到外面採風去了。
